sentences.sContent: I’m hoping to get my teaching diploma this year.
sentences.sCn: 我希望今年能拿到教师证书。

sentences.sContent: ...compared with 33% of those with a high school diploma or less...
...which results in the companies' too picky attitude on diploma since they don't worry about lacking candidates...
...What factors might contribute to diploma discrimination...
...Another factor is that diploma and certificates still weighs heavily in terms of signifying one's ability...
...some others consider all the diploma and certificates important standards by which a person's ability can be measured...

synos.tran: 毕业证书，学位证书；公文，文书；奖状

phrases.pCn: 大学文凭；（高等学校）文凭、毕业证书
研究生文凭；研究生文凭课程
[美口]文凭制造工厂；野鸡大学；不入流学校

remMethod.val: 做外交官(diplomat)需要资格证书(diploma)

words.tran: 经考试或审查合格的专科医生；学位证书持有者

trans.tranCn: 毕业文凭， 毕业证书， 资格证书
trans.tranOther: a document showing that someone has successfully completed a course of study or passed an examination
